bibl.title: A Question of Authenticity and Date: Roman Copies and Ptolemaic Originals. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Considers the imperial Roman fashion of using Egyptian and Egyptianising sculptural representations concentrating on three statues of questionable authenticity.

bibl.title: British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan

bibl.seg: ASHTON Sally-Ann, A Question of Authenticity and Date: Roman Copies and Ptolemaic Originals. Avec résumé en anglais.

British Museum Studies in Ancient Egypt and Sudan 2 (2002) pp. 1-10, 6 figg. n./bl. et coul. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/online_journals/bmsaes/issue_2/ashton.aspx >.]
Considers the imperial Roman fashion of using Egyptian and Egyptianising sculptural representations concentrating on three statues of questionable authenticity.
